pros:
Good pay and hours. 
Lively team
cons: Sometimes have to work in harsh weather conditions

pros: UNICEF as a not for profit organisation is incredible, they do great work and the teams of people behind it are highly dedicated to the cause and will always go out of their way to make a really big difference.
cons: The management in New Zealand is in real need of a shape up, poor communication and HR policies and very questionable hiring.
